titleStmt.title: A copy of some papers past at Oxford, betwixt the author of the Practicall catechisme, and Mr. Ch.
titleStmt.author: Hammond, Henry, 1605-1660.
Cheynell, Francis, 1608-1665.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Ja. Flesher for R. Royston ...,

notesStmt.note: Letters signed: H. Hammond, Fr. Chesnell.
Also appears at reel 2312:12 as part of "A collection of such answers and discourses" (Wing H524A).
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
